docs.snippet: Daisuke Matsuzaka struck out the side in the first inning and allowed only one run over six innings in what might have been his final shot at securing the role of the Mets’ fifth starter....
docs.lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka struck out the side in the first inning and allowed only one run over six innings in what might have been his final shot at securing the role of the Mets’ fifth starter.
docs.abstract: New York Mets pitcher Daisuke Matsuzaka allows only one run over six innings in spring training game against St Louis Cardinals; outing may be his final shot at securing role of Mets’ fifth starter.

headline.main: Matsuzaka Looks Strong in Bid for a Rotation Spot
headline.print_headline: Matsuzaka Looks Strong in Bid for a Rotation Spot

docs.snippet: Mark Teixeira had never played first base until spring training of his rookie season in the major leagues when the Texas Rangers asked him to go there from third. The move turned him into a more well-rounded player....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira had never played first base until spring training of his rookie season in the major leagues when the Texas Rangers asked him to go there from third. The move turned him into a more well-rounded player.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees first baseman Mark Teixeira had never played first base until spring training of his rookie season in the major leagues when Texas Rangers moved him there from shortstop; decision, which initially disappointed him, turned him into a more well-rounded player and five-time Gold Glove winner; it is unlikely that the Yankees will return him to shortstop when Derek Jeter retires.

headline.main: Teixeira’s Roundabout Trip to First Proves Right Path
headline.print_headline: Roundabout Trip to First Proves Right Path

docs.snippet: March 26 — Last day to request unconditional release waivers on a player without having to pay his full 2014 salary....

docs.snippet: A murder case involving Jerry Remy’s son draws attention in part because of the questions it raises about the extent of parental responsibility....
docs.lead_paragraph: A murder case involving Jerry Remy’s son draws attention in part because of the questions it raises about the extent of parental responsibility.
docs.abstract: Murder case involving Jared Remy, who is accused of fatally stabbing his girlfriend Jennifer Martel in August 2013, draws attention in part because it raises questions about extent of parental responsibility; Remy is son of Jerry Remy, longtime color announcer and former second baseman for Boston Red Sox, who, with his wife, is seeking custody of couple's young daughter Arianna, who is said to have been home at the time of the murder and has been living for several months with foster family.

headline.main: Case Spurs Fan Debate Over Boston Announcer
headline.print_headline: Case Spurs Fan Debate Over Boston Announcer

docs.snippet: Alex Rodriguez's lawyers want to keep a lid on potential video of him being questioned in his lawsuit against a New York Yankees team doctor, and a judge indicated Tuesday they might have valid concerns about sensitive medical queries becoming fod...
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez's lawyers want to keep a lid on potential video of him being questioned in his lawsuit against a New York Yankees team doctor, and a judge indicated Tuesday they might have valid concerns about sensitive medical queries becoming fodder for online sensation.

headline.main: A-Rod Wants to Keep Video Deposition Uncirculated

docs.snippet: Baseball players and management hope to reach a new drug agreement this week that would increase initial penalties for muscle-building steroids and allow a decrease of suspensions for some positive tests caused by unintentional use, people familia...
docs.lead_paragraph: Baseball players and management hope to reach a new drug agreement this week that would increase initial penalties for muscle-building steroids and allow a decrease of suspensions for some positive tests caused by unintentional use, people familiar with the negotiations told The Associated Press.

headline.main: APNewsBreak: MLB Hopes for New Drug Deal This Week
headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: MLB Hopes for New Drug Deal This Week

docs.snippet: Zack Greinke and the Los Angeles Dodgers have knocked Alex Rodriguez and the New York Yankees off baseball's payroll perch, part of an offseason spending spree that has the average salary approaching $4 million for the first time....
docs.lead_paragraph: Zack Greinke and the Los Angeles Dodgers have knocked Alex Rodriguez and the New York Yankees off baseball's payroll perch, part of an offseason spending spree that has the average salary approaching $4 million for the first time.

headline.main: Dodgers Top Spender, Ending Yanks' 15-Year Streak
headline.print_headline: Dodgers Top Spender, Ending Yanks' 15-Year Streak
